subject: Football
Super Bowl
Music
lead_paragraph: Beyoncé answered her critics during her halftime performance by singing live with fierceness and confidence. Late in her set, she was joined by her former sidekicks of Destiny’s Child.
snippet: Beyoncé answered her critics during her halftime performance by singing live with fierceness and confidence. Late in her set, she was joined by her former sidekicks of Destiny’s Child.
